results.name: Integers from 0 to A037834(n) followed by integers from 0 to A037834(n+1) and so on.
comment: Equivalently, integers from 0 to A005811(n)-1 followed by integers from 0 to A005811(n+1)-1 and so on.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2272
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 25 2013
